message: I live in the area, and will be attending if anyone needs me for some sort of labor at PyCon. :)
@jensechu http://us.pycon.org/2011/volunteer/onsite/signup/
Thanks. I had an email that directed me to post here.
I pinged @jessenoller earlier, and he told me that @dougnap and @rdavidmurray on twitter would be involved with coordinating some of the volunteer stuff tonigh (I'm helping with the network)
As am I.
Any word on stuff going tonight?  I'm up for helping with anything
@gthank @sontek continue to watch @pycon on twitter, with #volunteer - we'll be doing swag bag stuffing, possibly tonight, possibly tomorrow
SWAG bag stuffing starting up NOW - come by the registration desk, meet lots of fellow Pythonistas!
@yarkot stuffing bags was fun!
Thanks for the all the people that helped with bag stuffing, never seen it go that quickly before!
@coderanger Thanks for organizing us!  Our production line was so much faster than the other tables!
Too bad I couldn't be there. I'm arriving tomorrow night. Will help with anything else that comes up
Epic bag stuffing was epic.
We will be needing a lot of help for wire tape down in the main ballrooms around five o'clock tomorrow; Thursday.
@dougn What time you starting?
@sontek I think he said around 5
We've got a group getting together for dinner/drinks at Manuels for PyATL around 7 but I can help before and after
Thanks to everyone who made what I think is a record swag stuffing event - 1500=>2.5hrs (that works out to ~ 10bags / minute!)  -  y'all rock!
Thanks to all the volunteers for Session Chairs!  - we still need a few session runners - find an open spot, and help out:  http://bit.ly/i7yDm4
#session staff meeting session chairs & session runners: meeting in Green Room (Chicago E): 5:30 tonight, or for those who can't make tonight - 9:00AM after morning announcements
reg desk folks were not so excited about a prospect of help this morning... wonder why?
Are you still needing help with the network?
@dimaqq - we had limited registration stations, and we were awaiting help from some "luminaries";  thanks for helping!
@yarkot - coming now
@pycon call for #volunteers - at the coat-check (that is SWAG distribution area)   4:30 PM    Thanks!
@brianball too late
